headline: PPG recognizes GNE Paint & Supplies Inc. as 2024 Automotive Refinish Platinum Distributor of the Year
summary: STRONGSVILLE, Ohio, March 17, 2025--PPG (NYSE: PPG) today announced that it has named GNE Paint & Supplies Inc. of Detroit as its Automotive Refinish 2024 Platinum Distributor of the Year. The award recognizes a distributor with exceptional service, loyalty, product knowledge and support as part of the PPG PLATINUM DISTRIBUTOR® program.
